name: Everlasting Summer: Eternal
description:
"Eternal" is the author's vision of the fashion for the world of the camp, for its inhabitants, but most of all for those who hide behind its scenes.
This is a meditative story about those thrown into a hopeless place, which they will try to resist, will obviously lose and will be forced to accept.
This is an unpleasant story about suffering, despair and actions that a person would not even think about.
This is an atmospheric work where code, plot, sounds, music, animations, particles and other effects will immerse you with your head.
It's a nice time spent with a wonderful companion in the form of a cat-girl.
This is a raised spirit in the name of a great goal.
These are acquired abilities that spoil everything and weaknesses that help.
This is an influx of mixed and oppressive feelings, painful and repulsive thoughts, obsessive actions and an unhealthy desire to achieve goals unknown to oneself.
